*div1 type="summary"* *p*Morgan A. Heard to Austin, August 14, 1825. Introducing Robert Gillespie, of Alabama.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Franklin County Alabama*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-14-1825"> Aug. 14. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Colo*/p*
*p*In a few weeks my friend *person_mentioned*Mr Robt Gillespie*/person_mentioned* will set out on a journey to your *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, he has been much pleased with the description he has received of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*; and if his opinion on a view of it concurs with those who have described the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*to him he will be induced to locate himself in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. He will explore the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and particularly your *location_mentioned*Grant*/location_mentioned*; He is a Gentlemen who possesses an extensive knowledge of *person_mentioned*Mechanicks*/person_mentioned*, there is scarcely any species of Machinery but what he is well acquainted with, I have been ac- quainted with *person_mentioned*Mr. Gillespie*/person_mentioned* for ten or twelve years past, He is *person_mentioned*gentlemen of excellent sense and strict integrity*/person_mentioned*, and in evry respect will be a most useful and valuable member of our *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*; I recommend him to your polite Attention and trust you will afford him every information respecting the character of the Country, its Constitution and Laws. I know, of no man who can be more extensively useful in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*than he could be therefore you must fit him with *location_mentioned*a league of land*/location_mentioned* rich in soil well timbered, with a stream on which, all kind of *location_mentioned*water works*/location_mentioned*, may be erected. I have progressed this far on my way to *location_mentioned*Kentucky*/location_mentioned*, after I left you I purchased a good many mules on the edge of *location_mentioned*Louisiana*/location_mentioned*; and have been detained in selling them out, I shall certainly be with you by the *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1825">last of October*/date_mentioned*, present my respects to *person_mentioned*Mrs Gross*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mrs Long*/person_mentioned* and your *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Morgan A Heard*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Lt. Colo Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
